LanguageData.ShashlichnikCaveStabilityAdvice:
Cave becomes more unstable over time. Your mining can reduce cave stability as well.
You can build collumns to slightly improve stability.
The lower the stability, the more frequent landslides will occur.
When stability hits zero the cave will collapse
LanguageData.ShashlichnikCaveCollapsingDesc: Cave is collapsing! Extract your colonitsts as fast as possible.
LanguageData.ShashlichnikMessageCaveExitCollapsed: Exit collapsed, but there may be another way out...
LanguageData.ShashlichnikLandslideIncoming: The roof of the cave looks unstable, be aware of landslides.
